text: Extreme Rules (2014) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view (PPV) and livestreaming show made by WWE. It took place on May 4, 2014 at the Izod Center in East Rutherford, New Jersey. It was the sixth Extreme Rules event held by WWE and the first to also stream live on the WWE Network. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 El Torito (with Diego and Fernando) defeated Hornswoggle (with Heath Slater, Jinder Mahal and Drew McIntyre) WeeLC match 11:01 2 Cesaro (with Paul Heyman) defeated Jack Swagger (with Zeb Colter) and Rob Van Dam Triple Threat Elimination match 12:34 3 Alexander Rusev (with Lana) defeated R-Truth and Xavier Woods by submission 2-on-1 Handicap match 2:53 4 Bad News Barrett defeated Big E (c) Singles match for the WWE Intercontinental Championship 7:55 5 The Shield (Roman Reigns, Seth Rollins and Dean Ambrose) defeated Evolution (Triple H, Randy Orton and Batista) Six- man tag team match 19:52 6 Bray Wyatt (with Luke Harper and Erick Rowan) defeated John Cena by escaping the cage Steel Cage match 21:12 7 Paige (c) defeated Tamina Snuka by submission Singles match for the WWE Divas Championship 6:18 8 Daniel Bryan (c) defeated Kane Extreme Rules match for the WWE World Heavyweight Championship 22:27 (c) – is the champion(s) going into the match P – This match took place on the pre-show === Triple Threat Eliminations === Elimination Wrestler Eliminated by Method Time 1 Jack Swagger Rob Van Dam Pin 06:25 2 Rob Van Dam Cesaro Pin 12:34 3 Cesaro Winner == References == Category:2014 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in New Jersey Category:WWE Extreme Rules Category:2010s in New Jersey Category:2014 in the United States Category:May 2014 events
title: Extreme Rules (2014)
